info.name: Ys TV Calendar [CAT] *BROKEN*
info.description:
Site changed, css broken, don't use. Not styled every page; some will look screwy, but everything seems to work so sharing. Enjoy.

Note: This is very much a personal style-sheet, so the calendar looks best with my settings, aka everything off except "show airtime".
info.additionalInfo: Additional stylesheet that by-passes the need for a CAT account: style 97499
